description: This is a really tight and well integrated office solution for basic office file types. It has the ribbon-like interface of modern MS Office apps, can open and save in those file types, and also lives in one app with different tabs, something MS Office doesn't have which is cool.
Nothing is ever going to be totally compatible with MS Office but OnlyOffice comes by far the closest.

Despite the reviews below, it does open and work as intended on Ubuntu 22.04.4. Looks good, does some part of the job with tracking changes and commenting. Misses a lot of features though, and most importantly, making the checkpoints of the document. My system crashed and I have to start anew.
The UI is like MSO and it is fast. Thank you!
Horroroso, muito travado para planilhas com muitas informações.

On Android app, I can connect only office to edit documents on several other Cloud Drives (Google Drive, One Drive, DropBox etc...)

The flathub version does not allow such functionality, which make it hard to create a seemless and similar experience.

The Flathub app allow some that are not on the android app (Liferay, Moodle, Seafile etc...)
summary: No feature Parity with Android App

description:
Does not work on Ubuntu 22.04.4 LTS. Starting the program opens a window (frame) that shortly after that disappears without a trace. Using it open a docx file keeps the window from disappearing but the file contents are never displayed.
A disappointment. I am using ONLYOFFICE on my MacBook to work on files produced with MS Office. It works, not perfect, but enough to enable collaborations. However, on Ubuntu it does not even start.

At first glance, it looks most like MS Office. Certainly does fit most MS formatting, however Libreoffice still has the most options, loads more 
quickly and after several months trialling this app, I've switched back to Libreoffice.

The app doesn't respect the OS styling so the window borders look awful. The worst issue is how huge everything is. The app doesn't respect automatic window sizing. It can't be used with everything so huge on my display. The developers never have respected OS styling, but it at least used to mostly work.

ONLYOFFICE has great compatibility with LibreOffice and MS Office files. The interface is straightforward - it feels a bit sparse, but the features I need are there. It's fast, smooth and comes with various spell check languages out of the box.

It could use some originality though, as it looks a lot like MS Office. It's nice to be familiar, but using the same fonts, interface colors, and styles (especially in spreadsheets) makes it feel kind of cheap to me.
No need for another installation of Chrome on my PC.
For all documents of my work, in M$ formats, OnlyOffice gave de best compatibility. So I don't have to use M$ Office anymore.
This program works fine but be aware there can naturally have apparent inconsistencies with libreoffice.
It doesn't support display scaling. Not recommended if you are using a 4k, high dpi display.
has a good gui to work around with! :D ^_^
summary: great for when i'm screen sharing on zoom

description: Is amazing application. I like it!

Melo
asdasdasdasdasd

I recommend it for daily use in any Linux distro.
Has work to be done.

Beautiful, slick and functional, but not fully compatible with MS Office. Some simple spreadsheets are not so intuitive (multiple columns adjustments) and deserves a better fine tune.

The common user expects a good office app for Linux, capable do interact easily with MS Office. Onlyoffice can be this option and bring a huge amount of users to the Linux universe.
summary: Huge potential to be the top 1 office app for Linux

description: Latest version not available

After using Libre Office I find Only Office very slow and painful to use. On my Ubuntu Mate it doesn't conform to the rest of the software. It has its own style of interface that doesn't fit in with Ubuntu Mate. All my window buttons are on the top left but Only Office puts them on the top right and not matching in any way to my other windows. I'm not too fussed about looks but moving things around is very annoying for me.

I loaded some of my files and everything loaded fine and correctly, unlike when I try to load my files into Google Office. There doesn't seem to be any database so didn't test that side of it, only documents (.odt) and spreadsheets (.ods). I don't use presentations.

It looks like it has great possibilities if the speed and interface can be sorted out. I'm guessing the interface is designed to fit in with MS Windows so may be a good option for Windows users. Not for me, though. I'm going back to Libre Office for now.

its very similar and very compatible with MS office files

I like it because it's the best alternative of MS office

My fellow company workers use Windows and Office and I'm the only weirdo there that uses Ubuntu. I was editing a budget spreadsheet and when I clicked 'Save as' the program simply closed. No error message. No BSOD. Just hours of work lost.
summary: Sadly it's the MS Office alternative that sucks less :(

description: Amazing alternative very much similar to MS Office

great office app
it suits me for basic use office software. Looks better than Libreoffice.

description: Es realmente bueno (Love it)

Finally an open source office that's not confusing, i can actually write a document without searching half n hour for a bullet list
Beeing able to open different document types in the same window is also a superb feature
This is replacing libre office as of today
dosn't support RTL .

description:
Have been using LO for years now but haven't been happy with the last couple of upgrades; thought I'd give OnlyOffice a go but it opens single page docs over 2 pages and I couldn't seem to sort a table.

Will stick with LibreOffice

There is much to like about the simple, clean interface but when you cannot chane drfault setting like the language and font and instead have to set these for each new document... well, why would you bother with it?

It is just as slow as libre office but it can't copy and paste data into a spreadsheet properly. Where Excel and Calc both paste the data in a single row, this one makes weird merged cells that mess up the equations and the sorting.
Very useful alternative
Very nice, useful and it's the best alternative for MS Office. Thank you.
This office package was prompted as being more compatible with MS Office than Libreoffice, however, I can't use it as it just keeps crashing, going back to Libreoffice, it has always been reliable.

OK, LibreOffice is a factory of features for every type of office poductivity functions. It's great for a book publisher. Most normal people don't have time to sift through this application landscape to write a serious document. OnlyOffice, on the other hand, is a very modern, capable office suite that allows organizations or the normal user to carry out the most important modern office productive functions such as word processing, spreadsheet, presentation, form functions, and collaboration and mobile functions. Most of its power comes from web integration, but the desktop application alone is very powerful. It is a genuine FOSS application and it even allows the user the use of "Private Rooms" to maintain your documents secured with AES-250 encryption. The interface is what a modern office suite applications should emulate because it is easy, navigable, and a pleasure to use. I would put it above google.com's and Microsoft's web offering for its ability to allow the normal user to do actual work.

It's a beautiful, logically organized, easy to use, easy to setup, easy to get good results from, ....., office suite. I find I can do everything I did with those others productivity applications without the pain or the time waste funnel. It looks like this development group actually calculated that human beings were going to use this application for productive purposes instead of text and functions sifting. 
It can only get better. Thank you development team.
summary: A capable office suite for humans

description: The app is great, the toolbar or ribbon is way too small... I cant even read it without squinting and bringing my face close to the screen. The scaling is maxed out on 200% but still no improvement. I have been back and forth emailing them trying to get this problem solved with no joy. Forums require login so thats not an option for me. I will wait till that gets fixed before I use it.

This is the closest thing to MS Office that I was able to find. I was looking for an app that would allow proper watermark or handle .doc/.docx with watermark. This one does. 
For me it just works.
summary: The closest thing to MS Office

description: Clean interface, functionally superior! The Forms Editor is a game-changer, as it makes it easy to make fillable PDF forms. The spreadsheet app is comprehensive, although it is slow to load on older hardware. The fact that it's a single application with tabs for different types of documents (open at the same time) is also revolutionary and super-convenient. The amount of interoperability with MS Office means there are no headaches during migration. If a Grammarly plugin can be added I will give it 6 stars! Simply the greatest value in a single app on my PC right now.
Very functional and complete office suite, and it looks great too.

A very good app, almost a complete replacement for
ms office. Nice looking and very useful. You carry on like that.
I was looking for a spreadsheet app that had a familiar layout close to microsoft. Great since I'll only be dabbling monthly or so and I won't have to re-learn much each time.

Having RTL support is a fundamental feature of any word proccessor. Not having that means more than half a billion people can't use your software in their native language! Heck w3.org estimates it in over a billion!
https://www.w3.org/International/questions/qa-scripts
can do everything i need and my languige is suported so 9,5/10

good app, very useful

Everything works as expected and there is a great variety of functionalites. However, I experience crashes form time to time. While editing a document the program closes itself and some edits will be lost.
Fantastic foss actually just fantastic in general office tool would use any day over microsofts tools

description: I like it and cpuld be my office candidate for linux other than wps. But the presentations transitions and animations isn't much. Libreoffice got more transition but i don't like libreoffice interface. I got a high hopes for onlyoffice at first but there is only a few transitions that hold me behind to use it
Same UI/UX, same functionnalities but FOSS. My soon to be 50yo mother was event able to switch to this wihout any issue

OnlyOffice can not keep the users preferances from session-to-session. Also OnlyOffice can not seve/export files in useful file formats out of its world. Thes two fatal facts puts OnlyOffice 100 times less usefil than LibriOffice. My experiance is 60 years with computers of all types and oprating systems. Do not ignore me. I stated the true problems here.

description: If you work with MS Office file formats, then this suite is must have.
summary: Best FOSS alternative to MS Office core apps

description:
OnlyOffice Desktop Editiors is an Office Suite with three applications, Document, Spreadsheet and Presentation. These give a similar user interface and functionality to Word, Excel and PowerPoint respectively. The file format is also more compatible with Microsoft Office than other Office Suites.

The Office Suite has been in rapid development (see the changelog on GitHub). The Office Suite has been updated to support High DPI screens and appropriately scales on Linux. Document has also recently been updated to include a pretty powerful Equation Editor.

 Sadly there is no Visio/Drawing equivalent at present.
summary: Compatible Office Suite with Microsoft Office

description: This is the best open source office suite I have ever used.
If you need good compatability with Microsoft Office for work, education, etc. then this is by far the best office suite to use.
summary: Best Suite for MS Office Compatability

description: I will keep this on my system for the admittedly pretty good docx compatibility, however it's really buggy & I'm extremely unsatisfied with how the spellchecking is implemented. To me spellchecking is more important than anything else, but in some of my test files text boxes turned empty upon changing the document language from English to something else and yet I still could not do proper spellchecking in the rest of document. Then again, why do I have to do this again?
summary: Lots of Potential, but I would much rather just use Libre for now

description: a good replacement for word

Always been a fan of OOF and have it Installed on both my iMacs and a Windows 10 Pro PC as a conventional Installation. I also run Mint under Parallels on an iMac and with that it's Flatpak and perfectly OK. This being Snap for Ubuntu 22.04 under Parallels for IMac, I wasn't sure, but Installed and ran exactly like it does on MacOS and Windows as if it's a direct Installation.

It can import true MS Office Word 365 Docx's with perfect formatting and pagination, unlike LibreOffice. It's also by far, better than MS Word at copying off snippets of text and graphics from a web page. I'd say, it should be compared to MS Word and not to LibreOffice, as good as LO is.

I'd suggest the reviewer that said it was a Web App possibly Installed the Web version by mistake, as this one is the full local Installation and not a Web App.

My only critism, is, like most Software, they assume everone in the World lives in the USA. There are quite a few of us who happen live in the UK and a New Blank Document is taken from the USA 'New Doc' folder and not the UK one. One thing to be fixed OnlyOffice support say, at a later date. Then I'll drop my Office 365 subscription, as OOF is brilliant.

This is an App I cannot do without.

while the presentation is perhaps more MS like than LO the tools and workflow are not a polished.

a good back up in case you want the best image for PDF or screen cap, but not the office suite you want to do serious work in.

Cloud-based, extremely slow launches of any document.

Corrupts files if you open two instances of one file ie: docx file, and try to save it wont let you and erases the whole file contents from being corrupted.
Works great love installing software through flatpak!

Garbage-tier office knockoff that can't export word files beyond .docx or .docxf, can't get the formatting right so it is corrupted when loaded by real office users and can't paste clipboard unformatted and many more flaws and is worse in almost every aspect compared to MS Office. All they have to do is copy M$ and they would be golden.
summary: just use a vm with ms office

description: I like the interface a lot. Reminds me of Microsoft Office. However, the document formatting is often unpredictable and weird, and I feel it's a bit limited in places. Use LibreOffice instead. It's document editor is far superior and has more options.

description: Too slow, russian company. Garbage

Very nice office app. It is fast, lightweight and very nice user interface. The user interface is concise and I got pretty much all the options I need. The customization options are very easy to find. There is also export to PDF option which is available in the "print" area.

whhen i type the text kinda flickers then disapears then reapers
but i use an nvidia card so i suppose thats the reason why, using flatpak version, tried the native version(nixos) but a bug prevents the fonts from properly loading, if those two issues are fixed i will definitely 100% consider using it

OnlyOffice is not the most advanced tool of its kind, but it covers most needs quite fine and is easy and intuitive to use. Specially cloud features make it awesome. Also importantly for me, good support for Bangla (not in Spreadsheet yet though).

Works as expected. The interface is very similar to the mordern ribbon-based Microsoft Office, and with the extensible plugins, this office suite is easy to recommend to anyone looking for a decent office suite on Linux.
When a person gets frustrated with the limitations and lack of options with Libre Office, try Openoffice for a refreshing return to sanity. You will never regret the switch.

Overall, I really like OnlyOffice, but I have some troubles too. In my case, it is not possible to print directly from the app. With LibreOffice, no problem at all. Myanmar font is not correctly displayed in “Spreadsheet”. In the input line it is okay, but in the page it appears mixed up. For example, အော appears as "အ ော" and so on. This issue doesn't exist in “Document”. Would be great if this can be fixed soon.
I miss the option to search for and replace line breaks using the "Search and replace" -option, as it is possible in word. Also, it would be nice if it is possible to add pictures via "Drag and Drop".
In my case, starting the app takes ages. Not so LibreOffice. Thanks a lot for your good work!
summary: Verry good start but some things are missing

description: OnlyOffice is really a better alternative to Mic. Office. But for some languages, like Persian, it has a huge limitation that it does not support right to left writing.

I use it on Debian Desktop, Android Phone and selfhosted inside of my Nextcloud server. It is a key element of my own-your-data approach.

I really like the user interface compared to LibreOffice. But i noticed some issues regarding spreadsheet:
Every time I open a certain spreadsheet, the width of the columns got smaller, diagrams disappear or reset the formatting and at some point the spreadsheet got insanely huge with around 18000 columns and row which dont contain anything but nevertheless its too big to open the document with LibreOffice. 
Now I know the origin of the name. OnlyOffice as in: The OnlyOffice your documents will ever be compatible with afterwards....

description: Me ha funcionado muy bien hasta el momento. Compatible con los archivos excel que uso para mi trabajo. La interfaz es muy similar a la de costumbre y muy pulida.
Es fácil de usar, si buscas alternativas a office esta es de las mejores que hay junto con libre office
Completamente compatible con microsoft services.

El programa funciona muy bien, es sencillo para trabajos poco exigentes, tiene excelente compatibilidad con microsoft office, incluso en eso es superior que libre office, pero tiene un pequeño problema que para mi es muy importante, el corrector ortográfico no es bueno, , por ejemplo, hay faltas de ortografía que me las señala, pero al momento de la correccíon no aparece la manera correcta, si lo compongo yo mismo, entonces no me marca la falta, aunque en las opciones de correccion ortográfico no aparecía. en lo demás esta muy bien, lo usaré para abrir documentos que me manden hechos en microsoft office, porque para hacer documentos no me sirve por ese detalle, pierdo mucho tiempo corregir las faltas yo mismo.
Es una maravilla y funciona genial, solo le falta la compatibilidad con las pantallas táctiles y que respete el gestor de ventanas.
summary: Lo único malo es la compatibilidad con pantallas táctiles

description: ojala lo mejore en por ejemplo en pegar fotos por ejemplo de whatsapp y que las pases hay pero no se puede sale como una exis encerrada en cuadrado ojala lo mejoren

En cuanto a compatibilidad de archivos me parece excelente y tambien la interfaz de usuario, es simple todo se encuentra facilmente pero a la hora de usar el corrector ortografico por lo memos para el español no funciona, no esta bien integrado y las opciones que muestra no corresponden a las palabras correctas, sería bueno que se pudiera integrar con herramientas como LanguageTool y hay si se podría considerar como una gran alternativa, muchas gracias por esta herramienta.

La versión que se ofrece permite realizar tareas comunes para cualquier persona y el trabajo de fondo para la estabilidad y compatibilidad de los documentos es destacable. El aspecto gráfico es también otro de sus puntos fuertes (aunque si solo nos interesa lo estético tenemos otras opciones como WPS o SoftMaker Office). En lo personal, tenerlo instalado con Flatpak es bastante recomendable y si se quiere entrar en más opciones entonces sí que LibreOffice es la mejor alternativa. 

El aspecto más negativo es su corrector ortográfico en español, una opción en la versión actual para solventar este inconveniente es descargarse desde GitHub el diccionario de LibreOffice e instalarlo navegando por el gestor de archivos (o desde la terminal) sustituyendo el que trae por defecto.
Tiene un diseño moderno y cumple por completo todas mis exigencias. Aunque tampoco soy un usuario avanzado.
Literalmente compatible con Office Word de Microsoft
Muy buena aplicacion
perfect
Esta en español
Perfecta, me gustó mucho!

la aplicacion es excelente brillante y felicitaciones al que la invento
 mi hijo es autista y le encanta
Por fin un editor que tiene estetica con las fuentes del sistema, se ve bien y carga rapido.
summary: La interfaz y lo fluido del sistema debería estar disponible

description:
Antes editaba documentos de Microsoft office word, pero empezó a dañarme archivos originales y no lo quiero más.

NO abre documentos con encabezado ni pie de página y al poner una coma y guardar el trabajo elimina todo, al abrirlos en Windows el trabajo esta destrozado.
En la versión Flatpak funciona muy bien y se integra bien con el sistema, además han agregado plantillas para las diapositvas.
Tener todas las aplicaciones en una es increible y nunca me a fallado
El mejor software de Ofimatica para usar en Fedora 38 , va muy bien y abre los archivos sin hacer problemas ni corromperlos.
Además de su elegante diseño abre a la perfección los documentos de microsoft, lo cuál me es muy útil, a tal punto que es el que uso por defecto.

El mejor Office que he probado, mejor que libreOffice en diseño y funcionalidad, es como el hermano de Microsoft Office, hasta tienen un diseño muy similar, y los documentos de Microsoft Office se ven perfectamente, en lo que libreOffice siempre falló un poco, muchas veces, muchos documentos editados con libreOffice e inversa, se veian mal, o con distintos tamaños de letra o estructura, pero con este la compatibilidad es perfecta, segun lo creas, es como se ve en el otro. Y esta aplicación cuenta con una versión Online, a parte, el propio NextCloud lo tiene para instalar, yo tengo una cuenta en NextCloud con mi dominio en mi servidor, y la verdad, es que es un lujo. NextCloud es OpenSoucer también, y tiene una gran cantidad de opciones, no solo para almacenar tus datos de forma segura e independiente. (El mayor miedo de muchos, es no tener Office, por eso no quieren cambiar a Linux, pero con esta aplicación, es como estar usando Miicrosoft Office. La verdad es que yo personalmente he echado de menos dos cosas siempre en Linux: Microsoft Office, y photoshop. Ni un 5 o un 10, le daba un 100000. Recomiendo que lo prueben, y veran la gran di ferencia con otros, como LibreOfffice.

Soy usuario intensivo de Office 365 y he de decir que esta suite me ha encantado por la reducida curva de aprendizaje que se necesita y porque tiene muchas de las opciones nativas de office, además guarda los archivos en el formato nativo de office por lo que no te tienes que preocupar por compatibilidad. (se que se puede hacer lo mismo en otas suites, pero esta lo hace simple)

Cette application est juste génial, elle reprend le desin de Word, Exel, Power Point et autre tout sa dans une seul application, et fonctionne avec les formats universel, agréable à utilisé. Merci d'avoir dévlopper cette application.

Part d'une bonne idée mais se vautre sur des fonctionnalités essentielles comme : 
- la génération de PDF (quasiment pas d'options)
- fait des lignes sur les images insérées sur les documents lors de la génération de PDF
- crée des PDF énormes dès qu'on choisis de les générer en couleur même avec des images de quelques kilo-octets (aucune option de compression !)
- déforme les documents répondant au standard OpenDocument (un comble !)

bref c'est parfait pour faire du cracra sur des documents MS, pour le reste à moins de vouloir mettre en place du collaboratif, passez votre chemin, ce logiciel est pensé pour les docx et xlsx de Microsoft.

À mon sens, quand on est sous Linux et que l'on cherche une suite bureautique autre que LibreOffice, c'est que l'on souhaite une compatibilité maximale avec MS Office (en situation de quasi monopole dans les entreprises privées).
D'autre part, l'interface bureautique la plus connue étant celle de Microsoft, on perdra moins de temps à s'approprier un logiciel qui "emprunte" beaucoup à cette dernière.
Enfin, la traduction de l'application en français ainsi que sa vitesse d'exécution sont bien meilleures que celles d'une autre suite bureautique, WPS Office, elle aussi bien meilleure que LibreOffice en termes de compatibilité Microsoft.
En conclusion, pour les raisons sus-mentionnées, la possibilité de mettre en place du collaboratif, ainsi qu'une compatibilité exhaustive avec les sytèmes d'exploitaion d'aujourd'hui (mobiles inclus), OnlyOffice est à mon avis la meilleure alternative, à la suite de Microsoft.
C'est vraiment une excellent application comptabile avec Ms Office de Windows
menque fonctionaliter

À recommander à tout étudiant et étudiante ayant besoin d'une compatibilité avec msoffice.
Je préfère utiliser quand je peux Libre office, mais je dois bien reconnaitre que Only Office a très bien grandi.
summary: Quand on a absolument besoin d'un format MSoffice

description: Mes documents .docx s'ouvrent avec les figures plus déformées que dans libreoffice !
Ne fonctionne pas sur cet ordinateur. L'image est comme zoomé au maximum. Il n'a pas moyen d'évaluer le logiciel. Je recommande Libreoffice ou openoffice.
Contrairement à LibreOffice, on peut utiliser les fichiers créés sur Iphone ou Android.

Есть небольшие неточности, но в целом, очень неплохо!
И Ворд и эксель, очень хороши.
Спасибо!
Очень нехватает редактирования файлов webdav cthdthf k.,juj

Минусов пока не нашел, но прога весьма хороша, как альтернатива LibreOffice. К слову сказать, последняя (возможно из-за обновления) не открывает файлы и не сохраняет, вместо этого выдает ошибку, якобы нет доступа со стороны пользователя. А так как пользователь один и он же админ, то предположил, что проблема была со стороны проги. Так точно! Установил эту прогу и ВСЁ ЗАРАБОТАЛО! Все форматы, которые прога видит, сохраняются и открываются без пролем! Плюс прога полностью русифицирована! 5 звёзд!

Спасибо разработчикам за труд! Пакет прекрасный, как альтернатива LO. Очень неплохо смотрится на меленьком экране с небольшим разрешением. Есть редактор формул, что для меня крайне важно! Почему 4 звезды: форматирование абзацев (стили) слетают при открытии некоторых (далеко не всех) документов MS Office, что неудобно так как стилями и перекрестными ссылками я пользуюсь очень и очень часто; работает намного медленнее чем LO и MSO - документ на 180 стр с картинками и таблицами открывался ну прямо безумно долго.
В целом мне очень нравится, а тем более что Yandex свой пакет основал на данном, то и совместимость документов с облаком хорошая.
Спасибо!

Поставил вместо FreeOffice, на котором сидел много лет. Внезапно понадобились некоторые функции, а они оказались уже в платном пакете. Ранее ставил ONLY понравилось, но текст был сильно мелковат и поэтому снес. Сейчас установил - все в меру на 14 дюймах, отлично смотрится! Один минус- открывается заметно медленнее того же Libre и FreeOffice. Но в целом могу рекомендовать смело. Пожирает доки MSOffice очень хорошо)

Максимально похожее по удобству и красоте оформления на продукты от майкрософта.
Кажется, что документы загружает дольше аналогов, но зато работать очень приятно, удобный, привычные и понятный интерфейс

При использовании системной локали ru_RU.UTF-8 выдаёт ошибку (не хватает прав :think) при открытии/сохранении файлов. Если запустить из консоли 
LANG=ru_RU.UTF-8 run flatpak ...
ошибка уходит, сохраняет и открывает из nautilus'а, если есть копия, запущенная, как показано выше.
с firefox, onlyoffice такой проблемы нет.
Actualy programm for Linux
rfGDCJDHgvscjXH

Рекомендую избегать этой программы.
Я пользовался этим офисом какое-то время назад и уже забыл, в чём был подвох. А вот сегодня посмотрел рекламу, установил, был всем доволен, снова создал в нём важный документ с диссертацией, целый день возился с правками и под конец дня нажал ctrl + S чтобы сохранить. И вкладка с файлом зависла.
И тут я всё вспомнил. Обидно, что снова труд целого дня потерян! В таком состоянии офис будет висеть хоть несколько дней, ничего не произойдёт. Никакого автосохранения не сработает. Одним словом, подстава!
summary: Не работайте с важными файлами, изменения могут не сохраниться

description: Когда-то работал с ним, очень долго открывает документы, запускается тоже долго, невыносимо. На кде neon вообще не запустился
Сравнение с ЛО, наверное будет неверным, но, как по мне, OF - лучший офисный пакет для дома и офиса
Cool, recommendet.
Я бы поставил 5*, но невозможность изменить положение кнопок управления окном на привычное "close,minimize,maximize:" - для меня критично.
The document goes to print but does not come out.

Супер!
Пока нареканий нет

В презентациях нельзя вставить GIF - он не воспроизводится. Видео вставить, тоже через одно место. На ГИТе в ишузах проблема с гиф с февраля месяца висит, и за столько времени не решили вопрос. Почему то браузерный гугл докс работает в разы быстрее и без этих пробем. А так же поддержка драг-энд-дроп, по крайней мере в линуксе не работает. При выборе файлов нельзя показать эскизы, что крайне не удобно если в каталоге лежат много файлов одного типа.
Скачал «плоским пакетом»

Текстовый редактор. Функционал богатый. Слабее, чем в MSW, но можно привыкнуть. Сегодня на текстовом документе 100+ страниц начал вылетать. При изменении уровня заголовка (дважды), при операции вырезать/вставить фрагмент текста (более двух раз). Всё за 1 час. При этом уведомляет о произошедшем сбое, предлагает сохранить новую версю документа через "сохранить как...", но активных окон для сохранения не дает, кнопки меню становятся не активными, текст с экрана исчезает. Остается только сбросить приложение и повторно редактировать текст.

Табличный редактор. Один раз при сохранении повредил файл, из-за чего тот стал пустышкой нулевого размера. Восстанавливался из бэкапа, потерял три дня записей.

Общий опыт пользования - месяц. Печаль. Потенциал хороший, если бы не "вылеты"...
Вылетает на середине загрузки из-за битого пакета
Text editor constantly hangs (hard) when saving documents. Only restarting the device helps. Alas, but for me it is not acceptable. Please fix this problem.
summary: Text editor constantly hangs (hard) when saving documents

description:
тормозит при открытии даже локальных небольших по размеру фйлов.
не открывает документ из почтовой программы Evolution (по клику запускается Onlyoffice, но вместо необходимого файла открывается пустой документ)
плагин "отправить" не отправляет документ, ссылаясь на отсутствие почтовой программы по умолчанию, в качестве которой видит исключительно Thunderbird. Ни Evolution в Ubuntu, ни Outlook в Windows10 не использует для оправки документа с помощью плагина
summary: тормозит при открытии даже небольших локальных файлов

description: OnlyOffice отлично справляется и удобно работает , практически заменяет МС Офис в линуксе, рекоменду если вы переходите в линукс устанавливать OnlyOffice в замен!

Всем советую - совместимость с мсофисом самая лучшая из всех. 
Из минусов - функционльность хотелось бы побольше
summary: Отличный офисный пакет от русских разрботчиков

description: Отличная замена MS office. Весь функционал для обычной офисной работы есть, да, он проще майкрософта, но 99% пользователей онли офиса будет достаточно.
Простота в установке и использовании!

首先，它不是跑在wayland native上的这一点我不是很满意
然后，我在MSOFFICE上排过版的文件在onlyoffice上排版又乱了，合理怀疑反过来同样如此（考虑到老师们用msoffice,我必须使文件具有兼容性才可以）
但毕竟比wps可用性好多了（wps近期安装直接卡死+有字体问题）以及开源所以给三星了
how to uses?how to uses?
